title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 341 - Podiatry Care And Treatment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 341 - Podiatry Care And Treatment

State Regulations
§ 341.1 - Limitation of podiatry treatment
§ 341.2 - Report of attending podiatrist
§ 341.3 - Filing of reports
§ 341.4 - Required authorization
§ 341.5 - Surgical appliances
§ 341.6 - Duties of superseding podiatrist
§ 341.7 - Prohibitions
§ 341.8 - Carriers not to supply names of authorized podiatrists
§ 341.9 - Podiatrist fees for hearing purposes
§ 341.10 - Carrier's or employer's consultant not to treat employee
§ 341.11 - Examination procedure
§ 341.12 - Referral to authorized physician

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 341

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 13[a], [h][3], 13-a, 13-k,13-l, 117, 141; Volunteer Ambulance

Workers' Benefit Law, §§ 16, 57, 58;Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit

Law, §§ 16, 57, 58

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
